verbs.description: Hours after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: pulled] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: out of the Iran nuclear deal] , Former Secretary of State John Kerry took aim at allegations he 'd been engaging in " shadow diplomacy , " playing it off as primarily an effort to keep informed on international affairs .
